name: roll20-gloomhaven-api
description: Collection of Roll20 API Scripts for D&D.

scripts.test: npm run compile_script && npm run compile_module && mocha --recursive
scripts.compile_script: echo "" > INKTotal.js && find ./Scripts -type f -exec cat {} + >> INKTotal.js
scripts.compile_module: echo "require('mock20')" > INKModule.js && cat INKTotal.js >> INKModule.js && echo "MOCK20endOfLastScript();" >> INKModule.js

author: Kyle Smith <kyledavidady@gmail.com>
